Class SuccessUtils

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.cascadia.success.SuccessUtils
public class SuccessUtils extends Object
a class providing helper methods to evaluate player success conditions. This class defines a series of static methods for checking various success criteria, such as achieving minimum scores, specific wildlife or habitat conditions, and other gameplay-related achievements.
Author:
massinissa

  • Method Details

    • minimumScore

      public static boolean minimumScore(Player player, int minScore)
      Checks if the player has a score greater than or equal to the specified minimum score.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose score is being checked.
      minScore - The minimum required score.
      Returns:
      true if the player's total score is greater than or equal to the minimum score, false otherwise.

    • hasNoNatureTokensLeft

      public static boolean hasNoNatureTokensLeft(Player player)
      Checks if the player has no remaining Nature tokens.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      Returns:
      true if the player has no Nature tokens left, false otherwise.

    • hasNoAnimal

      public static boolean hasNoAnimal(Player player, Animal animal)
      Checks if a player has no instances of the specified animal on their board.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose board is being checked.
      animal - the type of animal to check for on the player's board.
      Returns:
      true if the player has no instances of the specified animal, false otherwise.

      player - the player to check
      minPoints - the minimum required habitat points
      Returns:
      tre} if the total habitat points are greater than or equal to minPoints, false otherwise

    • areHabitatsNotAdjacent

      public static boolean areHabitatsNotAdjacent(Player player, Habitat habitat1, Habitat habitat2)
      Checks if two specified habitats are not adjacent on the player's board.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose board will be checked
      habitat1 - the first habitat to check
      habitat2 - the second habitat to check
      Returns:
      true if the habitats are not adjacent, false if they are adjacent

      tokensThreshold - the minimum number of Nature tokens required
      Returns:

      minScore - the minimum score required for each habitat
      Returns:
      true if the player has at least the minimum score for all habitats, false otherwise

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the player has no completed perfect habitats, false otherwise

    • hasMajorityForThreeHabitats

      public static boolean hasMajorityForThreeHabitats(Player player)
      Checks if a player has a majority in at least 3 habitats.
      Parameters:
      player - The player (not null).
      Returns:
      true if the player has ≥ 3 majorities, false otherwise.

    • hasMinPointsForAllWildlife

      public static boolean hasMinPointsForAllWildlife(Player player, int minScore)
      Checks if a player has at least the minimum score for all wildlife types.
      Parameters:
      player - The player (not null).
      minScore - The minimum score required for each wildlife type.
      Returns:
      true if the player meets or exceeds the minimum score for all wildlife types, false otherwise.

    • hasMinPointsForTwoWildlife

      public static boolean hasMinPointsForTwoWildlife(Player player, int minScore)
      Checks if a player has at least the minimum score for at least two wildlife types.
      Parameters:
      player - The player (not null).
      minScore - The minimum score required for each wildlife type.
      Returns:
      true if the player meets or exceeds the minimum score for at least two wildlife types, false otherwise.

    • hasMinPointsForSingleWildlife

      public static boolean hasMinPointsForSingleWildlife(Player player, int minScore)
      Checks if a player has at least the minimum score for any single wildlife type.
      Parameters:
      player - The player (not null).
      minScore - The minimum score required for a wildlife type.
      Returns:
      true if the player has a score greater than or equal to minScore for at least one wildlife type, false otherwise.

    • hasMoreThanXOfOneAnimal

      public static boolean hasMoreThanXOfOneAnimal(Player player, int max)
      Checks if a player has more than a specified number of any single animal.
      Parameters:
      player - The player (not null).
      max - The maximum threshold for a single animal type.
      Returns:
      true if the player has more than max of any single animal, false otherwise.

    • hasMaxWildlifeTypes

      public static boolean hasMaxWildlifeTypes(Player player, int maxTypes)
      Checks if a player has scores for at most a specified number of distinct wildlife types.
      Parameters:
      player - The player (not null).
      maxTypes - The maximum number of distinct wildlife types allowed.
      Returns:
      true if the player has scores for maxTypes or fewer distinct wildlife types, false otherwise.
